{"id":1191238477,"question_id":724,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 2 weeks","timestamp":1709360332,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1191238477/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"45.8 MB","code":"// optimised space from 2 arrays to no array\nclass Solution {\n    public int pivotIndex(int[] nums) {\n        int totalSum = 0;\n        for (int num : nums) {\n            totalSum += num;\n        }\n        \n        int leftSum = 0;\n        for (int i = 0; i < nums.length; i++) {\n            if (leftSum == totalSum - leftSum - nums[i]) {\n                return i;\n            }\n            leftSum += nums[i];\n        }\n        \n        return -1;\n    }\n}\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
